title: Fendi’s Milan Runway Show, in Watercolor
text:
Photo: Samantha Hahn

Fendi’s spring/summer 2020 runway show in Milan invoked the psychedelic 1960s bold, beautiful things. Think floral motifs, quilted jackets, subdued earth tones with flashes of blue and green and baby-doll pink. There were rich brown suede dusters, heeled loafers, and sandals paired with silky mid-calf socks that we particularly enjoyed. If you want to wear the looks yourself, go all-in and replicate the models’ messy chignons and glittery eye makeup, too.

Here, see three of our favorite looks, illustrated by Samantha Hahn.

Illustrations by Samantha Hahn. Illustrations by Samantha Hahn.
description: See watercolor depictions of some of the best looks from Fendi’s 1960s-style spring/summer 2020 Milan fashion show, on the Cut.
